overview:
Chicago Makeup Artist & Hair Stylist Anita Arsova

For Anita, hair and makeup has always served as creative outlet for her thoughts, emotions and imagination. Her diverse portfolio is steeped in the philosophy that hair and makeup is an art form. Versatile, and detail-driven, Anita’s work seeks to find harmony between the beautiful and the surreal. As a fully certified cosmetologist and make up artist based in Chicago, Anita’s clients are as a diverse and unique as her work. Among her specialties, some highlights include, fashion shows and photography, television, film, and weddings, as well as other special occasions. Anita also provides lessons on proper makeup application.

firm.name: Chicago Makeup Artist & Hair Stylist Anita Arsova
